name: Holi Day
description:
In these silent nights, the jolly spirit is far to find. But you may be the spark needed to bring the holiday spirit back to life!

In Holi Day your goal is to collect snowflakes and present to upgrade and complete the holiday diorama and bring a happy holidays to everyone! There is even a nice gift for you at the end~!

How to play:
Click and drag across the screen to collect snowflakes and presents and use these in the menu on the left to upgrade your holimates and unlock decorations for the diorama!

Happy holidays! Stay up to date on everything Denedox in our discord server!
